did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: Wythe County, Virginia, Public Sale List, 1908
did.abstract: The collection consists of an advertisement for a sale of public lots in Wythe County, Virginia, prepared in 1908.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Wythe County, Virginia, Public Sale List must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Wythe County, Virginia, Public Sale List, Ms2017-054, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Wythe County, Virginia, Public Sale List was purchased by Special Collections in April 2016.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Wythe County, Virginia, Public Sale List was completed in October 2017.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of an advertisement for a sale of public lots in Wythe County, Virginia, prepared in 1908. The list also includes the name of the previoius owner, a brief description of the lot, the date it was sold to the state, and the state and county taxes due on each property. The sale was to be held on January 13, 1908.
